attributes.action: Say "NO" to being told that you cannot smoke in your own car or House
attributes.additional_details: I feel that the government and all the do gooder's should try tackling proper issue's instead persecuting smokers, Do people realise that if everyone was to stop smoking the government would lose a huge revenue stream, The loss would have to be met by the tax payer through higher taxes. Deal with proper issue's such as crime and drug addiction and unemployment which blight our society and is getting worse. We as smokers have rights as well, you have pushed us into the streets but you are not going to dictate to us smokers what to do in our cars or homes
